mapinfo.detailsText: Prairie map with central river and defensible crossings.\nMap by RF_Gandalf
mapinfo.loadDetailsText: Missouri Valley is a larger map with a central river and one or more crossings. There is a single trade route on each side of the map between the river and a set of bluffs. There are a few natives, either Cheyenne, Comanche or Cree.\n \nMap by RF_Gandalf
